message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.DS 

This paper deals with the optimization of relay selection in mobile networks, which is a topic related to network infrastructure and communication protocols. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also involves the use of Markov models and algorithms, which are related to information theory and signal processing, making cs.IT (Information Theory) another likely category. The paper also deals with the joint impact of localisation errors and inaccuracies of location information due to forwarding delays and mobility, which is related to control systems and system dynamics, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) another possible category. The paper also involves the analysis of deployment parameter choices, which is related to data analysis and statistics, making cs.MM (Multimedia) another possible category. Finally, the paper involves the development of optimal policies, which is related to optimization and decision making, making cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) another possible category.
